articles.title: Samsung Opens Pre-Orders for All-New Galaxy Z series and Intelligent Wearables - Samsung
articles.description: Following a highly anticipated Galaxy Unpacked event on Wednesday, 10 July 2024, Samsung Electronics South Africa has officially opened pre-orders for its
articles.content: Following a highly anticipated Galaxy Unpacked event on Wednesday, 10 July 2024, Samsung Electronics South Africa has officially opened pre-orders for its latest range of mobile and wearable devices.… [+2731 chars]
